alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Hidalgo; Jim Hogg (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 03 at 7:46PM CDT until June 04 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Brownsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 830 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN JIM HOGG...NORTHWESTERN HIDALGO...CENTRAL STARR AND SOUTHWESTERN BROOKS COUNTIES... At 746 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 9 miles southwest of Santa Catarina, or 10 miles east of El Sauz, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Locations impacted include... Rio Grande City, El Sauz, Puerto Rico, Starr County Memorial Hospital, Ringgold Middle School, Santa Catarina, Fort Ringgold County Park, Starr County Sheriffs Office, La Gloria and La Reforma. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
